summary: Completed comprehensive codebase reorganization and cleanup. Organized components into feature-based folders (layout, home, gallery, about, collaboration, shared), moved i18n to lib/, fixed all import paths, removed unused components (Gallery.old, Collections, Products, Shop, ProductCard, ProductDetail, SocialShowcase, UserMenu, AuthModal), updated README and created architecture documentation. Build succeeds with no errors. All functionality preserved - no behavior changes.
current_status: Codebase is now cleanly organized and maintainable. Components are grouped by feature, unused code removed, imports fixed, documentation created. Build verified successful. Ready for continued development.
